title: F1 legend Jackie Stewart recalls his greatest moments
summary: Were he to have his time again and had the blessing of choice, would Sir Jackie Stewart have raced in a different era? He’d surely have enjoyed the money Formula…

qa_pairs.question: Which driver is known for his legendary status and the nickname 'The Flying Scot'?

What significant aspect of Formula 1 has changed since Jackie Stewart's racing days?
